title: Ace Descender: Belgian Rider Forced to Climb Out of Hotel Bedroom Window Prior to Gent-Wevelgem
content:
Bizarre beginning to race day for Flanders-Baloise competitor Jules Hesters: 'Survived and ready to start'

Read the full article at Ace Descender: Belgian Rider Forced to Climb Out of Hotel Bedroom Window Prior to Gent-Wevelgem on Velo.
author: sstokes
